sentences.en: Are you plagued by fears that your partner is unfaithful?
sentences.cn: 你对你的伴侣可能不忠而充满恐惧 吗 ?

sentences.en: Because she was a coward, he had been unfaithful to her.
sentences.cn: 因为她是个胆小鬼, 他才对她不忠.

sentences.en: Example : That unfaithful employee was fired by the boss last week.
sentences.cn: 上个星期那个不忠实的员工被老板开除了.

sentences.en: Have you ever been unfaithful to him?
sentences.cn: 你对他是否有过不忠行为？

sentences.en: He confessed himself to be unfaithful to his friends.
sentences.cn: 他承认自己对朋友不忠实.

sentences.en: He is unfaithful to his duty.
He was an unfaithful servant when he fled from his master Philemon.
sentences.cn: 他是个不忠心的奴仆,从主人腓利门那里逃跑了.

sentences.en: How dare you say I an unfaithful man?
sentences.cn: 你怎们能说我是个不值得信任的人 呢 ?

sentences.en: I have never been unfaithful to you or your schooling.
sentences.cn: 我从来不曾辜负过您和您给我的教训.

sentences.en: If we are unfaithful he remains faithful, for he cannot deny himself.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不忠信,他仍然是忠信的, 因为他不能否认自己.

sentences.en: James had been unfaithful to Christine for the entire four years they'd been together.
sentences.cn: 在和克里斯蒂娜共同生活的4年中，詹姆斯一直对她不忠。

sentences.en: She has been trapped in an unfaithful marriage for years.
sentences.cn: (多年来她陷于不忠诚婚姻的困境. )

sentences.en: She wondered if Harry had been unfaithful to her during this long separation.
sentences.cn: 她不知道和哈里分开这么久，他是否曾对她不忠。

sentences.en: Sigurd, like his mythical relatives in Norse and Greek stories, was unfaithful in his loves.
sentences.cn: 与北欧和希腊神话故事中的其他英雄一样, 西格德对爱也不专一.

sentences.en: Yousee, the last time forme, I - I - I was bein'unfaithful.
sentences.cn: 你看, 我上次, 我 - 我 - 我显得不忠的.

trans.tran_cn: 不忠实的，不正直的，（翻译等）不可靠的，不贞洁的
trans.tran_en: someone who is unfaithful has sex with someone who is not their wife, husband, or usual partner
